title: [PDF][PDF] Expansion of Human Mesenchymal Stem Cells on Corning® Synthemax™ II-coated Corning Dissolvable Microcarriers in a Serum-free Cell Culture Medium

snippet:

used for cell therapy applications due to their regenerative properties and ability to differentiate
